problem.markdown:
>>All of the following statements about a reservoir behind a hydroelectric dam are true, but which is potentially problematic?<< () the reservoir can be used for recreation (swimming, boating) () the reservoir holds potential energy () the reservoir may be used for flood control (x) the reservoir may submerge existing vegetation
[explanation] Reservoirs may submerge existing vegetation, both destroying habitat for organisms as well as leading to methane release from anaerobically decaying vegetation. [explanation]
problem.p: All of the following statements about a reservoir behind a hydroelectric dam are true, but which is potentially problematic?
